pr_title: Update base image in multistage native doc

timeline.bodyText:
As mentioned by Loïc, let's do the opposite for now.
We will migrate to Java 11 by default soon but right now we still use java8 as the default for native images.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -369,6 +369,8 @@ Save this file in `src/main/docker/Dockerfile.multistage` as it is not included
 
 [WARNING]
 ====
+Replace the `-java11` in the base image with `-java8` if you want to use Java 8.

timeline.message:
Merge pull request #7070 from geoand/generates-fs-resources

Move generation of GeneratedFileSystemResourceBuildItem out of jar
Update building-native-image documentation with correct base image for java8
